languages.text: "Если Неумирающий пожелает взять в длань твою душу, он возьмет мою вместе с твоей. Но умрешь ты не от моей руки — не в этом мой долг".
"If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."
languages.original_text: "Если Неумирающий пожелает взять в длань твою душу, он возьмет мою вместе с твоей. Но умрешь ты не от моей руки — не в этом мой долг".

traits.locale_text: "If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine with it. You will not fall at my hand, for that is not my duty."
"If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine with it. You will not fall at my hand, for that is not my duty."
"If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."
"If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."
"If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."
"If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."

languages.text: «Si el Inmortal decide cobrarse su alma, también se llevará la mía. No será mi mano la que ponga fin a su vida, pues no es ese mi deber».
languages.original_text: "If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."

traits.locale_text: «Si el Inmortal decide cobrarse su alma, también se llevará la mía. No será mi mano la que ponga fin a su vida, pues no es ese mi deber».

languages.text: 「不死の者があなたの魂を奪うと決めたのなら、私の魂も一緒に奪うことになるわ。あなたは私の手で倒れることはないわ。それは私の任務ではないのだから」
languages.original_text: "If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者があなたの魂を奪うと決めたのなら、私の魂も一緒に奪うことになるわ。あなたは私の手で倒れることはないわ。それは私の任務ではないのだから」

languages.text: “如果不死之神要带走你的灵魂，那祂也必须把我的灵魂一起带走。你绝不会死在我的手里，因为这不是我的职责。”
languages.original_text: "If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."

traits.locale_text: “如果不死之神要带走你的灵魂，那祂也必须把我的灵魂一起带走。你绝不会死在我的手里，因为这不是我的职责。”

languages.text: "Wenn der Todlose beschließt, Eure Seele zu nehmen, wird Er auch meine nehmen. Ihr werdet nicht durch meine Hand fallen, denn das ist nicht meine Pflicht."
languages.original_text: "If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn der Todlose beschließt, Eure Seele zu nehmen, wird Er auch meine nehmen. Ihr werdet nicht durch meine Hand fallen, denn das ist nicht meine Pflicht."

languages.text: « Si l'Immortel jette Son dévolu sur votre âme, Il emportera aussi la mienne. Vous ne mourrez pas de ma main, car tel n'est pas mon devoir. »
languages.original_text: "If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'Immortel jette Son dévolu sur votre âme, Il emportera aussi la mienne. Vous ne mourrez pas de ma main, car tel n'est pas mon devoir. »

languages.original_text: "If the Undying One chooses to take your soul, He will take mine along with it. You will not fall by my hand, for that is not my duty."
